$description:
| What does this do? | Restricts non-privileged users from signing into the Microsoft Entra admin center; disables 'LinkedIn account connections' |
| Why should you use this? | Prevents potential phishing attacks and other risk scenarios due to accidental information disclosure. |
| What is the end-user impact? | Users will still be able to sign into Microsoft Entra admin center but will be unable to see directory information. Users will not be able to sync contacts or use LinkedIn integration. |
| Learn more | [Restrict user default permissions](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/fundamentals/users-default-permissions#restrict-member-users-default-permissions) [LinkedIn integration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/enterprise-users/linkedin-integration) |
